title: Growth of infant behaviour: Early stages
creator_credit: Arnold Gesell and ERPI Classroom Films
brief_description: The activities and responses of an infant seated in a small chair in a photographic dome are recorded. Simultaneous side-by-side projection gives a comparisons of the same infant at different ages.
